Responses.NAM1 - Response Text: Whatever you say. I will stay here until it's safe.
If you would just take care of Brerama Selas for me I could handle the rest myself, but I'll wait here if you want to poke around.
Very well, then. I will wait here for now.
Very well, then. I will wait here for now. When you are ready, come to me, and I will travel together with you to Zainab camp to meet my new bridegroom.
Very well, then. I will wait here for now.
I'll wait here for you. But hurry!
As you wish.
Really? Excellent! I mean...I wouldn't want to get in the way. You understand. I'll guard your back from here.
Not a bright choice, if you ask me.
If you insist.
Very well, then. I will wait here for now.
I will wait for you here.
Whatever you say. I will wait here.
Whatever you say. I will stay here until it's safe.
Okay. I'll stay right here.
Okay. I'll stay right here until you come and get me.
Okay. I'll stay right here until you come and get me.
I'll stay here until you think it's safe.
Not a bright choice, if you ask me.
If you insist.
Very well, then. I will wait here for now.
I will wait for you here. Please hurry. I do not feel safe here in Sadrith Mora.
Whatever you say. I will wait here.
I'll wait right here.
I will wait for you here.
I will wait here until you think it is safe.
Okay. I will stay here.
Okay. I'll stay right here until you come and get me.
Okay. I'll stay right here until you come and get me.
I will stay here until you tell me it is safe to go on.
I will wait for you here.
I shall wait for you here.
J'Saddha waits for you.
I will wait here. But do not test my patience.
All right.  I'll wait right here.
I'll wait here then.
Yes, powerful one. I, the poor slave, will wait here for you.
If you think it's wise. I'll wait here for you.
